text: Jasbir may refer to: *Jasbir Singh Bajaj, Indian Physician and Diabetologist has been conferred with the Padma Vibhushan award *Jasbir Jassi, Punjabi singer and actor *Jasbir Singh, former Indian cricketer and umpire *Jasbir Sandhu, Canadian politician *Jasbir Walia, serving Air Marshal of the Indian Air Force and present AOC-in-C of the Southern Air Command *Jasbir Singh Cheema, Indo-Canadian television personality and politician *Jasbir Puar, U.S.-based queer theorist who is currently an associate professor in the Department of Women's and Gender Studies at Rutgers University
title: Jasbir
